title: Apple Just Added Sudoku to Apple News — Here's How to Play It on iPhone, iPad, and Mac
description: Apple has yet another new game for Apple News+ subscribers on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. With the latest software updates, Sudoku officially joins Crossword, Crossword Mini, and Quartiles in the News app's Puzzles section. As with Crossword, Crossword Mini, and Quartiles, Sudoku is available to paid subscribers of Apple News+ in Australia, Canada, the United Kingdom, and the United States. News+ is available as an individual subscription or in the Apple One Premier package. If you don't subscribe, you may be able to play a few puzzles for free. To access Sudoku puzzles in the News app, you must... more
author: Justin Meyers

title: Unlock the Power of Visual Intelligence on Your iPhone to Translate and Explore the World Around You
description: In a new update, the iPhone 16 lineup is finally getting Visual Intelligence, a feature that lets you instantly gather information about anything around you just by snapping a picture. Integrated into the Camera Control button on iOS 18.2, currently in beta, Visual Intelligence gives you access to third-party services like ChatGPT and Google Search for insights, making it simple to learn about objects, landmarks, restaurant ratings, and even the breed of a dog you encounter. Below, we'll walk you through what you need to get started with Visual Intelligence, how to access its powerful tools... more

title: 7 and 7 Recipe
description: If you like simple mixed drinks, this is a fun one to try! The Seven and Seven (7 & 7) drink is a highball cocktail made using Seagram’s Seven Crown (a blended whiskey beverage) and 7 Up (a lemon-lime soda). The result is a sweet, easy mixed drink with citrus flavors. More Mixed Drinks: Cuba…

description: Happy Thanksgiving from my house to yours! title: 12 Questions That Will Prove You’re an IKEA Superfan (or Not)
description: Let me tell you about the most unexpectedly entertaining quiz I’ve encountered lately—the IKEA Icons Quiz. If you thought assembling furniture was an adventure, wait until you try deciphering the wild world of IKEA product trivia. The Quiz That’ll Make You a Certified IKEA Nerd The moment I landed on the page, a digital dare leaped out at me: “So, you think you’re a fan?” The words practically dripped with challenge, a siren call to every IKEA enthusiast’s competitive spirit. title: Your Unused Alcove Could Become This Chic Arched Office Nook
description: The IKEA PAX wardrobe is having a moment in the DIY world, and it’s not just about storage anymore. Clever hackers are reimagining these versatile units as architectural elements, using them to frame functional spaces in creative new ways. Just a few months back, we showcased a particularly ingenious hack where the space between PAX units could shape-shift from a desk to a bench. Now, we have another out-of-the-PAX hack — this one’s from Liz Meester, an Interior Graphic Designer […] The post Your Unused Alcove Could Become This Chic Arched Office Nook appeared first on IKEA Hackers.
